publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1259 Bruce Crawford on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Suspension of Standing Ordersâ€”That the Parliament agrees that, for the purpose of allowing up to 2 hours 5 minutes to debate motion S3M-1256 (Local Government Finance (Scotland) Order 2008) on Thursday 7 February 2008, the final sentence of Rule 10.7.1 of Standing Orders be suspended.
